alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 1:57AM EDT until June 05 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to a half foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways along Little Assawoman Bay and Barnegat Bay. * WHERE...In Delaware, Inland Sussex and Delaware Beaches. In New Jersey, Ocean and Coastal Ocean. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware Bay at Lewes MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 7.0 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 04/10 PM 6.7 2.0 1.3 Minor 05/10 AM 4.8 0.2 1.0 None 05/11 PM 6.5 1.8 1.0 Minor 06/11 AM 5.0 0.3 1.2 None 07/12 AM 6.6 2.0 1.2 Minor 07/12 PM 4.9 0.2 1.1 None Barnegat Bay at Barnegat Light MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.0 ft, Moderate 2.0 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 05/09 AM 3.0 0.5 0.9 None 05/10 PM 4.0 1.5 0.9 Minor 06/10 AM 3.0 0.5 0.9 None 06/10 PM 3.8 1.3 0.8 Minor 07/11 AM 2.8 0.3 0.7 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
